reviewText: This is the only video recording of Michel Corrette's six Symphonies de Noel (Christmas Symphonies).  The ensemble La Fantasia performs in a small, beautiful church in Holland.  The camera work is excellent, with frequent  tasteful closeups of the performers, offering good views of their playing.  The DVD doesn't come with a booklet, and is in PAL format (not playable on ordinary North American DVD players).  It is playable on PAL or multi - format DVD players as well as on computers.
